title: RDA DMP Common Standard Schema
description: JSON Schema for the RDA DMP Common Standard

type.title: The DMP Contact Identifier Type Schema
type.description: Identifier type. Allowed values: orcid, isni, openid, other

type.title: The Contributor Identifier Type Schema
type.description: Identifier type. Allowed values: orcid, isni, openid, other

created.title: The DMP Creation Schema
created.description: Date and time of the first version of a DMP. Must not be changed in subsequent DMPs. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string

type.title: The Dataset Identifier Type Schema
type.description: Dataset identifier type. Allowed values: handle, doi, ark, url, other

description.title: The Dataset Description Schema
description.description: Description is a property in both Dataset and Distribution, in compliance with W3C DCAT. In some cases these might be identical, but in most cases the Dataset represents a more abstract concept, while the distribution can point to a specific file.

distribution.title: The Dataset Distribution Schema
distribution.description: To provide technical information on a specific instance of data.

access_url.title: The Dataset Distribution Access URL Schema
access_url.description: A URL of the resource that gives access to a distribution of the dataset. e.g. landing page.

available_until.title: The Dataset Distribution Available Until Schema
available_until.description: Indicates how long this distribution will be/ should be available. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string.

byte_size.title: The Dataset Distribution Byte Size Schema

data_access.title: The Dataset Distribution Data Access Schema
data_access.description: Indicates access mode for data. Allowed values: open, shared, closed

description.title: The Dataset Distribution Description Schema
description.description: Description is a property in both Dataset and Distribution, in compliance with W3C DCAT. In some cases these might be identical, but in most cases the Dataset represents a more abstract concept, while the distribution can point to a specific file.

download_url.title: The Dataset Distribution Download URL Schema
download_url.description: The URL of the downloadable file in a given format. E.g. CSV file or RDF file.

format.title: The Dataset Distribution Format Schema
format.description: Format according to: https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml if appropriate, otherwise use the common name for this format.

items.title: The Dataset Distribution Format Items Schema

host.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Schema
host.description: To provide information on quality of service provided by infrastructure (e.g. repository) where data is stored.

availability.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Availability Schema

backup_frequency.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Backup Frequency Schema

backup_type.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Backup Type Schema

certified_with.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Certification Type Schema
certified_with.description: Repository certified to a recognised standard. Allowed values: din31644, dini-zertifikat, dsa, iso16363, iso16919, trac, wds, coretrustseal

description.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Description Schema

geo_location.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Geographical Location Schema
geo_location.description: Physical location of the data expressed using ISO 3166-1 country code.

pid_system.title: The Dataset Distribution Host PID System Schema
pid_system.description: PID system(s). Allowed values: ark, arxiv, bibcode, doi, ean13, eissn, handle, igsn, isbn, issn, istc, lissn, lsid, pmid, purl, upc, url, urn, other

items.title: The Dataset Distribution Host PID System Items Schema

storage_type.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Storage Type Schema

support_versioning.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Support Versioning Schema
support_versioning.description: If host supports versioning. Allowed values: yes, no, unknown

title.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Title Schema

url.title: The Dataset Distribution Host Title Schema
url.description: The URL of the system hosting a distribution of a dataset

license.title: The Dataset Distribution License(s) Schema
license.description: To list all licenses applied to a specific distribution of data.

license_ref.title: The Dataset Distribution License Reference Schema

start_date.title: The Dataset Distribution License Start Date Schema
start_date.description: If date is set in the future, it indicates embargo period. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string.

title.title: The Dataset Distribution Title Schema
title.description: Title is a property in both Dataset and Distribution, in compliance with W3C DCAT. In some cases these might be identical, but in most cases the Dataset represents a more abstract concept, while the distribution can point to a specific file.

issued.title: The Dataset Date of Issue Schema
issued.description: Issued. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string.

language.title: The Dataset Language Schema
language.description: Language of the dataset expressed using ISO 639-3.

language.title: The Dataset Metadata Language Schema
language.description: Language of the metadata expressed using ISO 639-3.

metadata_standard_id.title: The Dataset Metadata Standard ID Schema

identifier.title: The Dataset Metadata Standard Identifier Value Schema
identifier.description: Identifier for the metadata standard used.

type.title: The Dataset Metadata Standard Identifier Type Schema
type.description: Identifier type. Allowed values: url, other

personal_data.title: The Dataset Personal Data Schema
personal_data.description: If any personal data is contained. Allowed values: yes, no, unknown

security_and_privacy.title: The Dataset Security and Policy Schema
security_and_privacy.description: To list all issues and requirements related to security and privacy

items.title: The Dataset Security & Policy Items Schema

description.title: The Dataset Security & Policy Description Schema
examples: Server with data must be kept in a locked room

title.title: The Dataset Security & Policy Title Schema

sensitive_data.title: The Dataset Sensitive Data Schema
sensitive_data.description: If any sensitive data is contained. Allowed values: yes, no, unknown

technical_resource.title: The Dataset Technical Resource Schema
technical_resource.description: To list all technical resources needed to implement a DMP

items.title: The Dataset Technical Resource Items Schema

description.title: The Dataset Technical Resource Description Schema
examples: Device needed to collect field data...

name.title: The Dataset Technical Resource Name Schema

title.title: The Dataset Title Schema
title.description: Title is a property in both Dataset and Distribution, in compliance with W3C DCAT. In some cases these might be identical, but in most cases the Dataset represents a more abstract concept, while the distribution can point to a specific file.

type.title: The Dataset Type Schema
type.description: If appropriate, type according to: DataCite and/or COAR dictionary. Otherwise use the common name for the type, e.g. raw data, software, survey, etc. https://schema.datacite.org/meta/kernel-4.1/doc/DataCite-MetadataKernel_v4.1.pdf http://vocabularies.coar-repositories.org/pubby/resource_type.html

description.title: The DMP Description Schema
description.description: To provide any free-form text information on a DMP
examples: This DMP is for our new project

type.title: The DMP Identifier Type Schema
type.description: The DMP Identifier Type. Allowed values: handle, doi, ark, url, other

ethical_issues_description.title: The DMP Ethical Issues Description Schema
ethical_issues_description.description: To describe ethical issues directly in a DMP

ethical_issues_exist.title: The DMP Ethical Issues Exist Schema
ethical_issues_exist.description: To indicate whether there are ethical issues related to data that this DMP describes. Allowed values: yes, no, unknown

ethical_issues_report.title: The DMP Ethical Issues Report Schema
ethical_issues_report.description: To indicate where a protocol from a meeting with an ethical commitee can be found

language.title: The DMP Language Schema
language.description: Language of the DMP expressed using ISO 639-3.

modified.title: The DMP Modification Schema
modified.description: Must be set each time DMP is modified. Indicates DMP version. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string.

end.title: The DMP Project End Date Schema
end.description: Project end date. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string.

items.title: The DMP Project Funding Items Schema

funder_id.title: The Funder ID Schema
funder_id.description: Funder ID of the associated project

identifier.title: The Funder ID Value Schema
identifier.description: Funder ID, recommended to use CrossRef Funder Registry. See: https://www.crossref.org/services/funder-registry/

type.title: The Funder ID Type Schema
type.description: Identifier type. Allowed values: fundref, url, other

funding_status.title: The Funding Status Schema
funding_status.description: To express different phases of project lifecycle. Allowed values: planned, applied, granted, rejected

grant_id.title: The Funding Grant ID Schema
grant_id.description: Grant ID of the associated project

identifier.title: The Funding Grant ID Value Schema

type.title: The Funding Grant ID Type Schema
type.description: Identifier type. Allowed values: url, other

start.title: The DMP Project Start Date Schema
start.description: Project start date. Encoded using the relevant ISO 8601 Date and Time compliant string.
